name: RG-6 grenade launcher
description: Grenade launcher RG-6 (manual revolver grenade launcher) _____________________________________ Comprises: - Tubes with handle, sighting devices and lid; -Barbon block of trunks; -Chassis with axle and power bar; - Shock-trigger mechanism with pistol grip; - A telescopic telescopic butt with a rubber shock absorber. _____________________________________ Length, mm: -520 (in the stowed position) -680 (in combat position) _____________________________________ -The model is at the origin -Created with 3ds Max 2017 -Fully and fully "deployed", grid topology is met with minimal distortion -The modifier flow is closed, the grid is converted at 1-2 iterations of turbosmooth -Render with V-Ray visualization tools -Polis .: 386,944 -Verts .: 389 513 _____________________________________ Archive contains: -Model in the format: max2017, max2013 and OBJ -Materials (V-Ray) Show more
